properties.name: Detour - 76 Ave.
properties.description: Posted by Journalwebteam76 Avenue, 86 Street to 95 Street (total closure) Until approximately June 30 Retaining wall construction. Detour using 63 Avenue or 82 Avenue.

properties.name: Detour 34th St.
properties.description: Posted by Journalwebteam34 Street, North of Ellerslie Road (construction delays) Until approximately May 30th. Detour road for overpass construction at future Anthony Henday Drive, drive with care. Construction zone speed limit of 50 km/h will be in effect.

properties.name: Detour 50th St.
properties.description: Posted by Journalwebteam50 Street, North of Ellerslie Road (construction delays) Until approximately October 26. Detour road for overpass construction at future Anthony Henday Drive, drive with care. Construction zone speed limit of 50 km/h will be in effect.

properties.name: Detour 91st St.
properties.description: Posted by Journalwebteam91 Street, North of Ellerslie Road (construction delays) Until approximately October 26. Detour road for overpass construction at future Anthony Henday Drive, drive with care. Construction zone speed limit of 50 km/h will be in effect.

properties.name: Lane closure - 118 Ave. E.B.
properties.description: Posted by Journalwebteam118 Avenue, 170 Street to 180 Street (eastbound total closure) Until approximately September 30 Road Realignment. Detour using Yellowhead Trail or 114 Avenue

properties.name: Lane closures - Yellowhead
properties.description: Posted by JournalwebteamYellowhead Trail, 149 Street to 156 Street (various lane closures) Until approximately August 30 Road Construction. Detour using 118 Avenue or 137 Avenue.

properties.name: Lane reduction - 102A Ave.
properties.description: Posted by Journalwebteam102A Avenue at 99 Street (reduced to one lane westbound) Until approximately June 2009. Art Gallery of Alberta Construction. 102A Avenue at 99 Street will be reduced to one lane westbound and one left turn lane. Detour using 102 Avenue or 103A Avenue.

properties.name: Lane reduction - 114th St.
properties.description: Posted by Journalwebteam114 Street, 86 Avenue to 87 Avenue (reduced to one lane northbound) Until approximately October 12. Building Construction. Motorists are advised to detour using 112 Street or 109 Street.

properties.name: Lane reduction - 170th St.
properties.description: Posted by Journalwebteam170 Street, 90 Avenue to 103 Avenue (reduced to two lanes in each direction) Until approximately October 31. Road Widening and Rehabilitation. 170 Street will be reduced to two lanes in each direction for the duration of the project. Detour using 156 Street, 178 Street and Anthony Henday Drive as alternate routes.

properties.name: Low height - Scona/Connors Rd.
properties.description: Posted by JournalwebteamScona Road/Connors Road below James Macdonald Bridge (low clearance height restriction, northbound and southbound 4.2m) Until approximately September 15 Bridge Construction. Due to construction on the James MacDonald Bridge Low clearance height restrictions are now in effect for Scona Road/Connors Road below James Macdonald Bridge.The free flow lane from Connors Road to the James MacDOnald Bridge will also be closed for approximately 4 to 6 weeks for construction work under the bridge. Truckers use Wayne Gretzky drive as an alternate route.

properties.name: Macdonald Bridge construction
properties.description: Posted by JournalwebteamJames Macdonald Bridge (reduced to two lanes in each direction) Until approximately November 1. Bridge Rehabilitation. The James Macdonald Bridge will be reduced to two lanes in each direction with reduced lane widths for the duration of the rehabilitation project. Motorists are strongly encouraged to use other routes to avoid delays.

properties.name: Mall entrance closure
properties.description: Posted by JournalwebteamÂ 111 Street South 51 Avenue (closure of entrance to South Gate Mall) Until approximately October 1. The entrance to South Gate Mall from 111 Street at the north end of the transit Center will be closed. The left turn will be banned except for Transit.

properties.name: No left turn - 114th St.
properties.description: Posted by Journalwebteam114 Street at 76 Avenue (no left turns northbound or southbound) Until approximately November 30 South LRT Construction. Detour using 109 Street.

properties.name: Reduced lane width - Gretzky on-ramp
properties.description: Posted by JournalwebteamWayne Gretzky Drive, on-ramp from 106 Avenue Northbound Until approximately August 31. Sewer Repairs. Drive with care construction zone speed limit of 50 km/h in effect.

properties.name: Sewer work - 100 Ave.
properties.description: Posted by Journalwebteam100 Avenue, Anthony Henday Drive to 175 Street (single lane closed eastbound) Until approximately November 30. Sewer Construction. Motorists are advised to use left lanes.

properties.name: Total closure - 142 Ave.
properties.description: Posted by Journalwebteam142 Avenue, 123 Street to 127 Street (total closure) Until approximately July 20. Road Construction. 142 Avenue will be closed to all through traffic. Local access will be maintained at all times. Detour via 153 Avenue or 137 Avenue.

properties.name: Total closure - 199th St.
properties.description: Posted by Journalwebteam199 Street, 45 Avenue to Hemingway Road (total closure) Until approximately October 15. Road Construction. 199 Street will be closed to all through traffic. Local access will be maintained at all times. Detour using Anthony Henday Drive and 62 Avenue.

properties.name: Total closure - 50 Street
properties.description: Posted by JournalwebteamTuesday, September 11 until approximately October 31 Local access maintained. Detour using 34 Street or 66 Street.

properties.name: Total closure N.B. - 99th St.
properties.description: Posted by Journalwebteam99 Street from 102A Avenue to 103A Avenue (total closure northbound) Until approximately June 2009 Art Gallery of Alberta Reconstruction. Detour using 100 Street or 101 Street.

properties.name: Traffic split - Ellerslie Rd.
properties.description: Posted by JournalwebteamEllerslie Road, 66 Street to 75 Street Until Saturday, June 2. Duct Line Installation. Traffic will be split to the south half of Ellerslie Road. The speed limit has also been reduced to "Construction Zone Maximum 50 km/h". Detour using 23 Avenue.
